name: Badminton Star 2
description:
The best super-badminton-competition game now finished its upgrading!

You must be shocked by realistic badminton physics. In Badminton World, racket is far more beyond your imagination! Get ready for a Badminton Match!

Badminton World features:
- Simple touch controls
- Many rackets for sports equipment
- Play your favorite characters
- With different themes, you will never get bored during gaming
- Keep updating!

Be a real Badminton Star in this game!

The game belongs to Shenzhen QiXunXinYou Technology Co.,Ltd.
Enjoysports belongs to Shenzhen QiXunXinYou Technology Co.,Ltd.
